intro: Polyalthia rufescens, commonly known as the red-leaf polyalthia, is a tropical evergreen tree native to Southeast Asia. The plant produces small, fragrant white flowers that are clustered in panicles, followed by woody, ellipsoid fruits containing a single seed.
